Entry.Name: Cipher Suites TLS 1.3 compliance
Entry.Extended Name: Generate report for Cipher Suites supported by TLS 1.3

Mitigation.Textual:
The following cipher suites were added to the server configuration:{add}
Remove the following cipher suites from the server configuration:{remove}
Mitigation.Apache: These elements are managed by the SSLOpenSSLConfCmd Ciphersuites directive, with ':' serving as separator, '-' used to disable and '!' to kill an element (e.g., -ELEMENT, !ELEMENT)
Mitigation.nginx: These elements are managed by the ssl_conf_cmd Ciphersuites directive, with ':' serving as separator, '-' used to disable and '!' to kill an element (e.g., -ELEMENT, !ELEMENT)
Mitigation.Missing: The following ciphersuites are not supported by the current OpenSSL version: {missing_elements}.
